title: Collector
description: A document representing a collector profile, which is a specialized user with additional attributes like a digital business card.

collectorID.description: The unique identifier for the collector

userID.description: Reference to the unique identifier of the user this collector profile belongs to

picture.description: URL or path to the collector's profile picture

websites.description: List of URLs to the collector's personal or business websites

socials.description: Social media links for the collector, keyed by platform name

additionalDetails.description: Any additional details specific to collectors, such as specialties or years of experience
